events.name: Data journalism: from data to design to code
events.description: Data visualizations are a powerful tool for storytelling. You see them in the New York Times, the Washington Post and our local Straits Times. You see them in Reuters and the Economist.  How is news media utilising data in storytelling?  Join us as Jin Wu, a graphics journalist at Reuters, walks us through what she does. She will go through a brief introduction of the work flow from data collecting, data analysis to the final data viz presentation.  Data is not only about numbers!  If you're interested in telling stories with data, design and code, this meetup might be for you! We're running this event together with meetup Data Vis Singapore. https://www.meetup.com/Data-Vis-Singapore/ Come and meet your fellow enthusiasts in data storytelling. See you there!
events.location: Pixel Studios (Level 2) Seminar Room, 10 Central Exchange Green, Singapore 138649, Singapore
